articles.author: Gerrit De Vynck
articles.title: OpenAI finds Russian and Chinese groups used its tech for propaganda campaigns - The Washington Post
articles.description: Covert propagandists have already begun using generative artificial intelligence to boost their influence operations.
articles.content: SAN FRANCISCO ChatGPT maker OpenAI said Thursday that it caught groups from Russia, China, Iran and Israel using its technology to try to influence political discourse around the world, highlighting … [+5454 chars]
